remarks: The value of the coefficient vector of a polynomial multiplied on the left by a scalar.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Aug-2019.)
statement:
coe1sclmulval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1sclmulval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1sclmulval.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
coe1sclmulval.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
coe1sclmulval.s $e |- S = ( .s ` P ) $.
coe1sclmulval.t $e |- .xb = ( .r ` P ) $.
coe1sclmulval.u $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
coe1sclmulval $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( Y e. K /\ Z e. B ) /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( Y S Z ) ) ` N ) = ( Y .x. ( ( coe1 ` Z ) ` N ) ) ) $.
